name: Key Slinger
description:
(Full Screen Recommended)

To slay the enemies coming towards you, press the corresponding key on your keyboard to the letter on top of the closest enemy (either W, A, S, or D). For each enemy you slay you gain a little bit of health back, however, press the wrong key and you will lose some health and be stunned for a short period of time.  If your health bar is depleted, you lose.

How long can you last? 

This is currently a prototype / minimum viable product. If you have any feedback,  please let me know. Since there is no leaderboard yet, comment down below what your best score was. I hope you enjoy it and look forward to more updates in the future!
